channel.title: Mark Meadows
channel.description: Mark Meadows Republican Candidate for Congress, 11th District, North Carolina (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: You are here and I am here because we indeed do believe in America! We are at a crossroads; we have a choice to make.
item.author: Mark Meadows

item.title: We have a President who wants his party to make us all dependent on government. We need leaders who believe in the prosperity that the free market brings.
item.author: Mark Meadows

item.title: We have a President who tramples our first amendment right to religious liberty by requiring all taxpayers to fund abortions.
item.author: Mark Meadows

item.title: We need public servants who respect life and our religious freedom.
item.author: Mark Meadows

item.title: We have a President all-too-willing to lead from behind. We need a White House that will unflinchingly support our strongest ally, Israel.
item.author: Mark Meadows

item.title: We need a President who believes in America.
item.author: Mark Meadows

item.title: We have a nation too precious to give up on. We have a history too glorious to be forgotten. We have a Constitution too noble to be rewritten. We have a God who reigns over the affairs of nations.
item.author: Mark Meadows

item.title: And we have a people who, once again, are ready to stand up as "We the People" and choose for themselves the direction of their beloved country.
item.author: Mark Meadows

item.title: I'm Mark Meadows and I'm running for Congress. With Mitt Romney, we're ready to take our country back. ###
item.author: Mark Meadows
